intro: Escape the underworld, but don’t break the chain—or each other.
description:
Bound by fate and forged in fire, Chained Through Hell takes you on a relentless journey from the depths of the underworld to the path of redemption. Whether braving the inferno solo or teaming up with friends, you’ll be physically and mentally tethered—literally—by a chain that can be both your greatest tool and deadliest obstacle.

Master the art of movement as you swing, climb, and strategize your way through nightmarish landscapes. Each hellish realm presents unique challenges, requiring teamwork, quick thinking, and perfect timing to overcome deadly traps and relentless enemies. The further you climb, the more punishing the trials become, pushing you to adapt, communicate, and make split-second decisions.

With stunning visuals, immersive audio, and evolving mechanics, Chained Through Hell isn’t just about escaping—it's about surviving together. Will you break free, or will the underworld claim you forever?
